parts.part: Lord Southampton Lord Courtown Lord John Clinton

relation.text: 1781 A little after 8 oClock their Majesties Princeſs Royal -- Augusta -- Elizabeth -- Prince of Wales ( & some of his Attendants viz : Lord Southampton Lord Courtown Lord John Clinton Mr. Digby ) Prince Edward ( his Governor Mr Bruyeres ) Lady Charlotte Finch Miſs Goldsworthy Miſs Hamilton aſsembled
